USE nyc_taxi_ldw

DROP VIEW if EXISTS silver.vw_trip_data_green
GO

CREATE VIEW silver.vw_trip_data_green
AS
    SELECT [result].filepath(1) as year,
           [result].filepath(2) AS month,
           result.*
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'silver/trip_data_green/year =*/month =*/*.parquet',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src'
            
        )
    WITH(
        vendor_id INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        rate_code_id INT,
        pu_location_id INT,
        do_location_id INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT)
    )AS [result]
GO

SELECT top(100) * FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green
